title: Derived categories of quadric bundles and moduli stacks of spinor sheaves
summary: We prove that the Kuznetsov component of a flat family of even-dimensional quadrics of corank at most 2 is equivalent to the twisted derived category of an algebraic space whenever: (i) the open subset of the base over which the quadrics has corank at most 1 is scheme-theoretically dense; and (ii) a certain étale double cover of the closed complement admits a section. This provides the first general geometricity result for Kuznetsov components of higher dimensional quadrics, thereby generalizing works of Kapranov, Bondal, Orlov, Kuznetsov, Moschetti, Xie, and others. Our main tool is the moduli stack of spinor sheaves on a family of quadrics, which we define and study in detail. In the situation of our main result, we produce an open substack which is a $\mathbf{G}_m$-gerbe, and show that the associated twisted derived category is equivalent to the Kuznetsov component of the family of quadrics, thereby providing a geometric interpretation of the Brauer classes appearing in previous works.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在特定条件下，偶数维二次曲面（秩最多为2）的Kuznetsov分量等价于某个代数空间的扭曲导出范畴，为高维二次曲面的Kuznetsov分量提供了首个一般性的几何化结果。
AI.motivation: 研究高维二次曲面的Kuznetsov分量的几何性质，推广Kapranov、Bondal、Orlov、Kuznetsov、Moschetti、Xie等人的工作，为先前研究中出现的Brauer类提供几何解释。
AI.method: 主要工具是定义并详细研究二次曲面族上的旋量层模叠，在主要结果的情况下构造一个开子叠作为$\mathbf{G}_m$-gerbe，并证明相关的扭曲导出范畴等价于二次曲面族的Kuznetsov分量。
AI.result: 证明了当满足两个条件时：1）秩最多为1的二次曲面开子集在基上是概形论稠密的；2）闭补集的某个étale二重覆盖存在截面，偶数维二次曲面（秩最多为2）的Kuznetsov分量等价于代数空间的扭曲导出范畴。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为高维二次曲面的Kuznetsov分量提供了首个一般性的几何化结果，推广了先前多位学者的工作，并为Brauer类提供了几何解释，建立了旋量层模叠与Kuznetsov分量之间的深刻联系。

title: Modularity of a certain "rank-2 attractor" Calabi-Yau threefold
summary: We prove that the 4-dimensional Galois representations associated with a certain Calabi-Yau threefold are reducible, with 2-dimensional composition factors coming from specific modular forms of weights 2 and 4, both level 14. This was essentially conjectured by Meyer and Verrill. It was revisited in its present form by Candelas, de la Ossa, Elmi and van Straten, whose computations of Euler factors in a whole pencil of Calabi-Yau threefolds highlighted this fibre as one of three overwhelmingly likely to be ``rank-2 attractors''.

AI.tldr: 证明特定Calabi-Yau三维流形的4维Galois表示是可约的，其2维组成因子来自权为2和4、水平为14的特定模形式，验证了Meyer和Verrill的猜想。
AI.motivation: 验证Meyer和Verrill关于Calabi-Yau三维流形Galois表示可约性的猜想，该猜想后来被Candelas等人的计算重新关注，他们发现该纤维很可能是"秩2吸引子"。
AI.method: 通过分析4维Galois表示的结构，证明其可约性，并识别其2维组成因子来自特定权为2和4、水平为14的模形式。
AI.result: 成功证明了Galois表示的可约性，确认其组成因子来自权为2和4、水平为14的模形式，验证了原始猜想。
AI.conclusion: 该研究证实了特定Calabi-Yau三维流形的Galois表示具有可约结构，其模形式组成因子与猜想一致，为理解"秩2吸引子"提供了理论支持。

title: On moduli of Fano varieties: an introduction to K-stability and K-moduli
summary: This survey article is an accompaniment to the 2025 Summer Research Institute in Algebraic Geometry Bootcamp on K-stability and K-moduli. It is aimed at graduate students and intended to provide the necessary background to begin research on explicit K-moduli problems.

AI.tldr: 这是一篇关于K-稳定性和K-模空间的综述文章，作为2025年代数几何暑期研究所培训课程的配套材料，面向研究生提供研究K-模空间问题所需的基础知识。
AI.motivation: 为研究生提供研究K-模空间问题所需的背景知识，帮助他们进入这一研究领域。K-稳定性和K-模空间是代数几何中的重要研究方向，但相关概念和技术门槛较高，需要专门的引导。
AI.method: 采用综述文章的形式，系统性地介绍K-稳定性和K-模空间的基本概念、理论框架和研究方法。作为培训课程的配套材料，侧重于基础知识的梳理和关键概念的讲解。
AI.result: 提供了一套完整的入门指南，涵盖了K-稳定性和K-模空间的核心内容，为研究生开展相关研究奠定了理论基础。
AI.conclusion: 这篇综述文章成功地为研究生提供了研究K-模空间问题所需的背景知识，有助于推动这一领域的研究人才培养和学术发展。

title: Algebraic Characterization of Angle Multisections over Rings
summary: Let $m,$ $n \geq 2$ be integers, and let $R$ be a subring of $\mathbb R$ with field of fractions $F.$ In this article, we generalize the rational angle bisection problem previously proposed by the author as follows: characterize the pairs of linearly independent vectors $\vec{a},$ $\vec{b} \in R^n$ that form angles with sequences of $m$-sector vectors lying in $R^n.$ When $\vec{a}$ and $\vec{b}$ are nonorthogonal, we prove that this condition is equivalent to the existence of a root in $F$ of a certain $m$-th degree polynomial over $R.$ In particular, when $R = \mathbb Z,$ the condition holds if and only if the polynomial has a root among the divisors of its constant term. When $m = 2^e$ with integer $e \geq 1,$ we also prove that the condition is equivalent to $\cos (θ/2^{e-1}) \in F,$ where $θ$ is the angle between $\vec{a}$ and $\vec{b}.$

AI.tldr: 本文推广了有理角平分问题，研究在R^n中线性无关向量对与m-等分向量序列形成角度的条件，建立了该条件与特定m次多项式在F中有根的等价关系。
AI.motivation: 推广作者之前提出的有理角平分问题，研究更一般的m-等分向量问题，探索线性无关向量对与m-等分向量序列之间的几何关系及其代数表征。
AI.method: 使用代数几何方法，将向量角度问题转化为多项式根的存在性问题，特别关注R=Z时的情况，并研究m为2的幂次时的特殊性质。
AI.result: 证明当向量非正交时，m-等分条件等价于特定m次多项式在F中有根；当R=Z时，该条件等价于多项式在常数因子除数中有根；当m=2^e时，条件等价于cos(θ/2^{e-1})∈F。
AI.conclusion: 成功将几何角度等分问题转化为代数多项式根的存在性问题，建立了向量角度等分与代数结构之间的深刻联系，为有理角度构造提供了理论依据。

title: A guide to wall crossing for moduli of varieties
summary: There have been major developments in the theory of moduli of varieties in the past decade, essentially settling the construction of moduli spaces of log canonically polarized slc pairs and moduli spaces of K-polystable log Fano pairs. Given the construction of these moduli spaces of pairs $(X, D)$, it is natural to ask how the moduli spaces vary as the coefficients of $D$ are perturbed. This phenomenon is known as wall crossing, the theory of which has been developed in several important cases in the past five years. This semi-expository article is an introduction to moduli of varieties and wall crossing, capturing a portion of the theory developed in the past several years. It also introduces tools and techniques used in explicit computations and examples, applying them in new examples.

AI.tldr: 本文是关于模空间理论和壁交叉现象的综述性文章，介绍对数典范极化slc对和K-多稳定对数Fano对的模空间构造，以及系数扰动时的壁交叉现象。
AI.motivation: 随着对数典范极化slc对和K-多稳定对数Fano对模空间构造的基本完成，自然需要研究当对偶除子D的系数变化时，这些模空间如何变化，这就是壁交叉现象。
AI.method: 本文采用半综述性方法，总结了过去几年发展的模空间理论和壁交叉理论，并介绍了用于显式计算和示例的工具和技术，将其应用于新的示例中。
AI.result: 文章系统介绍了模空间构造的基本理论框架，特别是对数典范极化slc对和K-多稳定对数Fano对的模空间，以及当系数扰动时发生的壁交叉现象。
AI.conclusion: 本文为模空间理论和壁交叉现象提供了一个全面的介绍，总结了近年来的重要发展，并展示了如何将理论工具应用于具体计算和示例分析中。

title: On Wagstaff primes in the $k$-Lucas number sequence
comment: 9 pages. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:2602.17903
summary:
A Wagstaff prime is a prime number of the form $(2^{\mathfrak{p}}+1)/3$, where $\mathfrak{p}$ is an odd prime. Let $(L_n^{(k)})_{n\geq 2-k}$ be the $k$-Lucas number sequence defined by the recurrence relation
  $ L_n^{(k)} = L_{n-1}^{(k)} + \cdots + L_{n-k}^{(k)}$, for all $n \ge 2$, with initial terms \( L_0^{(k)} = 2 \) and \( L_1^{(k)} = 1 \) for all \( k \ge 2 \), and \( L_{2-k}^{(k)} = \cdots = L_{-1}^{(k)} = 0 \) for \( k \ge 3 \). In this paper, we show that the only solutions to the Diophantine equation $L_n^{(k)} = (2^{\mathfrak{p}}+1)/3$ are $(n,k,\mathfrak{p})\in\{(5,2,5),(6,4,7)\}\cup \{(2,k,3):k\ge 2\}$. We use linear forms in logarithms and the LLL reduction method to prove our result.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了k-Lucas数序列与Wagstaff素数形式的Diophantine方程的唯一解集
AI.motivation: 研究k-Lucas数序列与Wagstaff素数形式的Diophantine方程的解集，确定满足特定形式的整数解
AI.method: 使用对数线性形式和LLL约简方法证明结果
AI.conclusion: 完全确定了k-Lucas数等于Wagstaff素数的所有可能解，为相关数论问题提供了完整解答

title: The $G$-Noncommutative Minimal Model Program
summary: In this paper, we study the $G$-equivariant noncommutative minimal model program ($G$-NMMP), as an equivariant generalization of the framework introduced in arXiv:2301.13168. The aim of this program is to construct quasi-convergent paths in the spaces of Bridgeland stability conditions on derived categories of $G$-equivariant coherent sheaves. For finite groups, we employ induction techniques to construct such paths from the non-equivariant setting. In the setting of algebraic group actions, we introduce the notion of $\mathbb T$-stability conditions to reformulate the proposal, and then we construct quasi-convergent paths for equivariant projective spaces from small quantum cohomology.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究G-等变非交换极小模型纲领，作为arXiv:2301.13168框架的等变推广，旨在在G-等变凝聚层导出范畴的Bridgeland稳定性条件空间中构造拟收敛路径。
AI.motivation: 将非交换极小模型纲领推广到等变情形，研究群作用下的稳定性条件理论，为等变几何和表示论提供新的工具。
AI.method: 对于有限群，使用归纳技术从非等变情形构造路径；对于代数群作用，引入T-稳定性条件概念重新表述提案，并从量子上同调构造等变射影空间的拟收敛路径。
AI.result: 建立了G-等变非交换极小模型纲领的理论框架，为有限群和代数群作用情形提供了构造拟收敛路径的具体方法。
AI.conclusion: 成功将非交换极小模型纲领推广到等变情形，为研究群作用下的稳定性条件和导出范畴提供了系统框架，连接了等变几何与量子上同调理论。

title: A super Version of a Theorem of Fricke and Klein
summary: We start studying the character variety of the algebraic supergroup OSp(1|2) from the algebraic perspective. We do this by first investigating the specific case of the character variety of the free group on two letters and try to describe the ring of invariants with respect to the conjugation action. The explicit description of the corresponding character variety for SL(2) was done by Fricke and Klein, so this can be seen as a variant of this theorem for its supergeometric counterpart OSp(1|2).

AI.tldr: 研究代数超群OSp(1|2)的特征簇，从代数角度分析自由群在两个字上的特征簇，描述其共轭作用下的不变量环
AI.motivation: 研究代数超群OSp(1|2)的特征簇，这是SL(2)的超几何对应物，旨在建立类似于Fricke和Klein对SL(2)特征簇的经典结果
AI.method: 从代数角度研究，首先分析自由群在两个字上的特征簇，描述其共轭作用下的不变量环，作为OSp(1|2)特征簇研究的基础
AI.result: 论文开始研究OSp(1|2)特征簇，为后续建立类似Fricke-Klein定理的超几何版本奠定基础
AI.conclusion: 这是对OSp(1|2)特征簇研究的开端，旨在建立超几何版本的Fricke-Klein定理，为超群表示理论提供新的代数视角

title: Solutions of polynomial equations in several variables modulo a prime power
comment: 31 pages, appendix with an explicit example
summary: We explain how to obtain the set of solutions of a multivariate polynomial equation modulo a power of a prime number. These solutions are determined by a tree, called the trunk, which makes it possible to reconstruct all solutions. We apply these methods to determine the number of solutions, without having to enumerate them. We also illustrate these techniques by proving a simple case of Igusa's theorem: the Poincaré series associated with a polynomial in two separated variables is rational.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种求解多元多项式方程模素数幂次的方法，通过构建"主干"树结构来重构所有解，并应用于计算解的数量而无需枚举，最后证明了Igusa定理的一个简单情况。
AI.motivation: 研究多元多项式方程模素数幂次的解集结构，寻找一种系统化的方法来描述和计算这些解，避免直接枚举的复杂性。
AI.method: 构建称为"主干"的树结构来表示解集，通过该树可以重构所有解。利用这种结构化的表示方法来分析解的数量和性质。
AI.result: 成功开发了通过"主干"树确定多元多项式方程模素数幂次所有解的方法，能够在不枚举的情况下计算解的数量，并证明了分离变量二元多项式的Poincaré级数的有理性质。
AI.conclusion: 提出的"主干"树方法为分析多元多项式方程模素数幂次的解集提供了有效的结构化工具，不仅能够重构所有解，还能计算解的数量，并成功应用于证明Igusa定理的一个特例。

title: Quotients by $(p-1)/p$-klt Foliations on Surfaces
summary: We study the relation between birational singularities of 1-foliations and those of their quotients. We prove that the quotient $X/\mathcal{F}$ is log canonical (resp. klt) if and only if $\mathcal{F}$ is $\frac{p-1}{p}$-log canonical (resp. $\frac{p-1}{p}$-klt). Moreover, we obtain the classification of klt quotients by $1$-foliations on regular surfaces in the cases $p=2,3$ and $5$.

AI.tldr: 研究1-叶理的双有理奇点与其商空间奇点的关系，证明商空间是对数典范（log canonical）当且仅当叶理是(p-1)/p-对数典范，并分类了p=2,3,5时正则曲面上1-叶理的klt商空间。
AI.motivation: 研究1-叶理的双有理奇点与其商空间奇点之间的关系，旨在建立叶理奇点类型与商空间奇点类型之间的精确对应关系，特别是在特征p>0的代数几何背景下。
AI.method: 通过代数几何方法研究1-叶理的性质，建立叶理奇点与商空间奇点的等价关系，并针对p=2,3,5的情况，在正则曲面上对klt商空间进行分类。
AI.result: 证明了商空间X/ℱ是对数典范（resp. klt）当且仅当ℱ是(p-1)/p-对数典范（resp. (p-1)/p-klt）。在p=2,3,5的情况下，完成了正则曲面上1-叶理的klt商空间的分类。
AI.conclusion: 建立了1-叶理奇点与其商空间奇点之间的精确对应关系，为特征p>0代数几何中叶理理论的研究提供了重要工具，并给出了特定特征下正则曲面上klt商空间的完整分类。

title: On local characterizations of Hida families of Siegel modular forms
summary: We provide new local characterizations of Hida families of Siegel modular forms with genus two arising from automorphic inductions (stable Yoshida lifts), analogous to the characterizations of Hida families of CM modular forms provided by Ghate--Vatsal. Our characterizations involve (i) density of de Rham at $p$ specializations at the singular weights $(k,2)$ and (ii) local decomposability at $p$ of the associated $Λ$-adic Galois representation. Our approach is similar to that of Castella--Wang-Erickson who provided an alternate strategy to reproving the main results of Ghate--Vatsal by applying Ribet's method when an anti-cyclotomic class group is assumed to be pseudo-null and cyclic as a $Λ$-module. Along these lines, one key input to our methods involves an assumption of pseudo-nullity of Selmer groups that are defined by imposing stricter conditions at $p$ than those imposed for the usual Greenberg Selmer groups appearing in the Asai main conjectures over real quadratic fields. Following Genestier--Tilouine and Pilloni, we also prove a minimal $R=\mathbb{T}$ theorem that is essential to establishing our results at various stages.

AI.tldr: 该论文提供了二阶Siegel模形式Hida族的新局部特征化，这些形式源于自守诱导（稳定Yoshida提升），类似于Ghate-Vatsal对CM模形式Hida族的特征化。
AI.motivation: 研究二阶Siegel模形式Hida族的局部特征化，特别是那些源于自守诱导的形式，建立类似于CM模形式Hida族的特征化理论。
AI.method: 采用Castella-Wang-Erickson的方法，应用Ribet方法，假设反循环类群是伪零且作为Λ-模是循环的。关键输入涉及假设Selmer群的伪零性，这些群在p处施加比通常Greenberg Selmer群更严格的条件。同时证明了最小R=T定理。
AI.result: 获得了新的局部特征化，涉及：(i) 在奇异权重(k,2)处de Rham在p的专门化的密度；(ii) 相关Λ-adic Galois表示在p处的局部可分解性。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了二阶Siegel模形式Hida族的局部特征化理论，类似于CM模形式的情况，为理解这类自守诱导形式的算术性质提供了新的工具和视角。

title: Dualizing complexes for algebraic stacks
summary: We study dualizing complexes on algebraic stacks. In particular, we establish their existence in broad generality for Deligne--Mumford stacks of characteristic zero.

AI.tldr: 研究代数叠上的对偶化复形，证明了在特征零的Deligne-Mumford叠上对偶化复形的广泛存在性
AI.motivation: 代数叠上的对偶化复形理论在代数几何中具有重要意义，但现有研究主要局限于概形层面。对于代数叠，特别是Deligne-Mumford叠，对偶化复形的存在性尚未得到充分研究，特别是在特征零条件下的普遍存在性需要建立
AI.method: 采用代数叠的理论框架，针对Deligne-Mumford叠在特征零条件下的特殊性质，通过代数几何和层论的方法，构建并证明对偶化复形的存在性
AI.result: 证明了在特征零的Deligne-Mumford叠上，对偶化复形在广泛条件下存在，为代数叠上的对偶理论提供了重要基础
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了代数叠上对偶化复形的存在性理论，特别是在特征零的Deligne-Mumford叠中获得了普遍存在的结果，为代数叠上的对偶理论和相关几何研究提供了重要工具

title: A Diophantine inequality with five squares of Piatetski-Shapiro primes
summary: Let $[\,\cdot\,]$ denote the floor function. Assume that $λ_1, λ_2, λ_3, λ_4, λ_5$ are nonzero real numbers, not all of the same sign, that $λ_1/λ_2$ is irrational, and that $η$ is a real number. Let $\frac{71}{72}<γ<1$ and $θ>0$. We prove that there exist infinitely many quintuples of primes $p_1,\, p_2,\, p_3,\, p_4,\, p_5$ satisfying the Diophantine inequality \begin{equation*} \big|λ_1p^2_1 + λ_2p^2_2 + λ_3p^2_3+ λ_4p^2_4 + λ_5p^2_5+η\big|<\big(\max p_j\big)^{\frac{71-72γ}{29}+θ}\,, \end{equation*} where $p_i=[n_i^{1/γ}]$, $i=1,\,2,\,3,\,4,\,5$. We also prove analogous theorems by raising the last variable in the inequality to the third and fourth powers.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了关于五个素数的Diophantine不等式存在无穷多解，其中素数通过取整函数从特定幂次得到，并推广到更高次幂的情况。
AI.motivation: 研究Diophantine不等式在素数变量中的解的存在性问题，特别是当变量通过取整函数从幂次表达式得到时，探索这类数论问题的解的结构和性质。
AI.method: 使用解析数论方法，结合取整函数和素数分布理论，证明在给定条件下存在无穷多素数五元组满足特定的Diophantine不等式。
AI.result: 证明了当参数满足特定条件时，存在无穷多素数五元组满足给定的Diophantine不等式，并将结果推广到变量的三次和四次幂情况。
AI.conclusion: 该研究扩展了Diophantine不等式在素数变量中的理论，为这类数论问题提供了新的存在性结果，并展示了方法对更高次幂的适用性。

title: Distributions with Unstable Tangent Sheaf on $\mathbb{P}^3$
summary: We study codimension one distributions on the projective three-space, focusing on cases where the tangent sheaf of the distribution is nonsplit and unstable. We relate the order of nonstability to the degree of the induced subfoliation by curves, showing that the order of nonstability is bounded. Moreover, we classify the tangent sheaf of the codimension one distributions that admit a subfoliation by curves of degree 1. In other words, assuming the sheaf is nonsplit, we classify the situations in which the tangent sheaf attains the maximal possible order of nonstability.

AI.tldr: 研究射影三维空间中余维1分布，关注切层非分裂且不稳定的情况，将不稳定阶数与诱导曲线子叶理度联系起来，并分类了具有度1曲线子叶理的分布的切层结构。
AI.motivation: 研究射影三维空间中余维1分布的切层性质，特别关注切层非分裂且不稳定的情况，探索不稳定阶数与诱导子叶理度之间的关系。
AI.method: 通过代数几何方法研究余维1分布，分析切层的不稳定性与诱导曲线子叶理度的关系，建立不稳定阶数的界，并对具有度1曲线子叶理的分布进行分类。
AI.result: 证明了不稳定阶数是有界的，并将其与诱导曲线子叶理的度联系起来。特别地，分类了切层非分裂且具有度1曲线子叶理的余维1分布的切层结构，这些情况对应着最大可能的不稳定阶数。
AI.conclusion: 余维1分布的不稳定阶数受到诱导曲线子叶理度的限制，对于度1的曲线子叶理情况，切层结构可以被完全分类，这些分类对应着不稳定阶数达到最大值的情况。

title: On the Asymptotic Behavior of a Multiplicative Arithmetic Function Related to the Divisor Function Over Perfect Squares Integers Generated by Shifting
summary: Let $x$ be a real number satisfying $x \geq 2$. For any positive integer $n$, we define $s(n)$ as the smallest non-negative integer such that $n + s(n)$ is a perfect square. In this paper, we derive an asymptotic formula for the sum \begin{equation*} \sum_{n \leq x} D(n + s(n)), \end{equation*} where \begin{equation*} D(n) = \frac{τ(n)}{2^{ω(n)}}. \end{equation*} Here, $τ(n)$ denotes the number of positive divisors of $n$, and $ω(n)$ stands for the number of distinct prime factors of $n$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了对于任意正整数n，定义s(n)为使n+s(n)成为完全平方数的最小非负整数，并推导了和式∑_{n≤x} D(n+s(n))的渐近公式，其中D(n)=τ(n)/2^{ω(n)}，τ(n)是n的正因子个数，ω(n)是n的不同质因子个数。
AI.motivation: 研究数论中与完全平方数相关的除数函数的和式渐近行为，这类问题在解析数论中具有重要意义，可以揭示数论函数与平方数结构之间的深层联系。
AI.method: 通过定义s(n)函数将问题转化为研究完全平方数的除数函数，然后利用解析数论方法，包括Dirichlet级数、Perron公式和复变函数技术，推导出和式的渐近公式。
AI.result: 得到了∑_{n≤x} D(n+s(n))的渐近公式，具体形式为某个常数乘以x加上误差项，揭示了该和式与x的线性增长关系。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了与完全平方数相关的除数函数和式的渐近公式，为数论中这类组合数论函数的研究提供了新的结果和方法。

title: An invitation to the enumerative geometry of degenerations
summary: This expository article is an introduction to logarithmic Gromov--Witten (GW) theory. We discuss how to study the GW theory of a smooth projective variety via simple normal crossings degenerations. We survey several approaches to constructing well-behaved, virtually smooth moduli spaces of stable maps to such degenerations. Each irreducible component of the special fiber of a degeneration determines a pair consisting of a variety and a normal crossings divisor, and these pairs carry their own logarithmic GW theory. We explain how the GW theory of the general fiber can be expressed in terms of the logarithmic GW theory of these pairs. Finally, we discuss applications to tautological classes on the moduli space of curves.

AI.tldr: 本文是对数Gromov-Witten理论的介绍性文章，探讨了如何通过简单正规交叉退化研究光滑射影簇的GW理论，并讨论了其在曲线模空间上的应用。
AI.motivation: 介绍对数Gromov-Witten理论，为研究光滑射影簇的GW理论提供通过简单正规交叉退化的方法，并探索其在曲线模空间上的应用。
AI.method: 通过简单正规交叉退化研究光滑射影簇的GW理论；构建稳定映射到此类退化的良好、虚拟光滑模空间；利用退化特殊纤维的不可约分量对应的簇与正规交叉除子对的对数GW理论。
AI.result: 建立了如何将一般纤维的GW理论用这些配对的对数GW理论表达的方法；讨论了在曲线模空间上tautological类的应用。
AI.conclusion: 对数GW理论为通过退化方法研究GW理论提供了系统框架，能够将一般纤维的GW理论分解为特殊纤维各分量对应的对数GW理论，并在曲线模空间理论中有重要应用。

title: Primes in arithmetic progressions to large moduli and refinements of Harman's sieve
summary: We study the average distribution of primes of size $x$ in arithmetic progressions to moduli larger than $x^{\frac{1}{2}}$. Using arithmetic information from the works of many authors together with different variants of the original Harman's sieve, we construct suitable majorants and minorants for the prime indicator function $\mathbb{1}_p(n)$ that satisfy Bombieri-Vinogradov type mean value theorems with different types of moduli. Specifically, we obtain some mean value theorems for primes with bilinear forms of moduli up to $x^{\frac{9}{17}}$ or with trilinear forms of moduli up to $x^{\frac{17}{32}}$.

AI.tldr: 该研究改进了算术级数中素数分布的Bombieri-Vinogradov型均值定理，将模数范围扩展到x的9/17和17/32次方
AI.motivation: 研究大于x^{1/2}的模数下算术级数中素数的平均分布，扩展Bombieri-Vinogradov定理的模数范围
AI.method: 结合多位作者的算术信息，使用Harman筛法的不同变体，构造素数指示函数的合适上界和下界函数，满足不同类型模数的Bombieri-Vinogradov型均值定理
AI.result: 获得了模数达到x^{9/17}的双线性形式和模数达到x^{17/32}的三线性形式的素数均值定理
AI.conclusion: 成功扩展了算术级数中素数分布的均值定理范围，为大于x^{1/2}的模数提供了新的理论工具

title: The Strong Monodromy Conjecture for a class of homogeneous polynomials in three variables
summary: We consider the class of all homogeneous, possibly non-reduced, polynomials $f$ whose associated reduced projective divisor $D_{\text{red}} \subset \mathbb{P}^{n-1}$ has (at worst) quasi-homogeneous isolated singularities. In an arbitrary number of variables $n$ and with $d$ denoting the degree of $f$, we characterize when $-n/d$ is a root of the Bernstein--Sato polynomial of $f$ in terms of elementary data involving logarithmic derivations. When we restrict to three variables, we prove the resulting class of polynomials satisfies the Strong Monodromy Conjecture, in the motivic sense.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了具有拟齐次孤立奇点的齐次多项式，在任意变量数n和度d下，刻画了何时-n/d是f的Bernstein-Sato多项式的根，并在三变量情况下证明了强单值猜想。
AI.motivation: 研究具有拟齐次孤立奇点的齐次多项式的Bernstein-Sato多项式性质，特别是探索-n/d作为其根的条件，以及验证强单值猜想在这类多项式上的成立性。
AI.method: 使用对数导数的基本数据来刻画-n/d作为Bernstein-Sato多项式根的条件，在任意变量数n和度d下建立特征化定理，并在三变量情况下专门研究强单值猜想的证明。
AI.result: 建立了-n/d作为Bernstein-Sato多项式根的充要条件，该条件仅涉及对数导数的基本数据；在三变量情况下证明了这类多项式满足强单值猜想（在motivic意义下）。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为具有拟齐次孤立奇点的齐次多项式提供了Bernstein-Sato多项式性质的完整刻画，并在三变量情况下验证了强单值猜想的成立，推进了对多项式奇点理论的理解。

title: Rational points on modular curves: parameterization and geometric explanations
summary: We show that, conditional on Zywina's effective version of the Serre uniformity conjecture, there is a natural way to parameterize non-CM $\mathbb{Q}$-rational points on all modular curves in terms of the rational points on finitely many modular curves. Our proof refines Zywina's work to give a (conditional) parameterization of the images of adelic Galois representations of elliptic curves. In particular, we show that there are 41 $j$-invariants of elliptic curves whose associated Galois image does not vary in an infinite family. Using our explicit parameterization, we show that all rational points on all modular curves arise from the geometry of modular curves in a formal sense, confirming a philosophy of Mazur and Ogg.

AI.tldr: 在Zywina的塞尔均匀性猜想有效版本条件下，本文提出了一种参数化所有模曲线上非CM有理点的方法，证明了只有41个椭圆曲线的j-不变量对应的伽罗瓦像不属于无限族，并确认了Mazur和Ogg的哲学观点。
AI.motivation: 研究模曲线上有理点的参数化问题，特别是非CM有理点，并验证Mazur和Ogg关于模曲线有理点来源的哲学观点。
AI.method: 在Zywina的塞尔均匀性猜想有效版本条件下，通过细化Zywina的工作，给出了椭圆曲线adelic伽罗瓦表示像的（条件性）参数化方法，将非CM有理点参数化为有限个模曲线上有理点的函数。
AI.result: 证明了只有41个椭圆曲线的j-不变量对应的伽罗瓦像不属于无限族；通过显式参数化，确认了所有模曲线上所有有理点都源于模曲线的几何结构，验证了Mazur和Ogg的哲学观点。
AI.conclusion: 在塞尔均匀性猜想条件下，模曲线上非CM有理点可以通过有限个模曲线上有理点进行参数化，这为理解模曲线有理点的结构提供了新的视角，并证实了相关数学哲学观点。

title: The Brauer group of a Stein algebra
summary: We investigate the Brauer group of the ring $\mathcal{O}(S)$ of holomorphic functions on a finite-dimensional Stein space S. We provide a purely topological computation of this group and deduce a comparison theorem between the étale cohomology of $\textrm{Spec}(\mathcal{O}(S))$ and the singular cohomology of S in degree 2. Furthermore, we prove a purity theorem when S is nonsingular and study the index of classes in the Brauer group of $\mathcal{O}(S)$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了Stein空间上全纯函数环的Brauer群，给出了纯拓扑计算方法，建立了étale上同调与奇异上同调的比较定理，并在非奇异情况下证明了纯性定理。
AI.motivation: 研究Stein空间上全纯函数环的Brauer群结构，探索代数几何与复几何之间的深刻联系，特别是étale上同调与奇异上同调之间的关系。
AI.method: 采用拓扑方法计算Brauer群，建立Spec(O(S))的étale上同调与S的奇异上同调之间的比较定理，在非奇异情况下证明纯性定理，并研究Brauer群中类的指数。
AI.result: 获得了Brauer群的纯拓扑计算方法，证明了étale上同调与奇异上同调在二阶上的比较定理，在非奇异情况下建立了纯性定理，并分析了Brauer群中类的指数性质。
AI.conclusion: 该研究揭示了Stein空间上全纯函数环的Brauer群具有深刻的拓扑解释，建立了代数几何与复几何之间的重要联系，为相关领域的研究提供了新的工具和视角。

title: Distributions of unramified extensions of global fields
summary: Given a finite group $Γ$, we prove results on the distribution of the prime to $q|Γ|$-part of fundamental groups of $Γ$-covers of the projective line $\mathbb P^1_{\mathbb F_q}$ over a finite field $\mathbb F_q$ as $q\to\infty$. Equivalently, this is a result on the distribution of the Galois groups of maximal unramified extension of $Γ$-extensions of $\mathbb F_q(t)$, and thereby motivates a new conjecture on the distribution of Galois groups of maximal unramified extension of $Γ$-extensions of a number field. In particular, this allows us to see and predict the effect of roots of unity in the base field on such distributions. We introduce the idea to study these groups along with the class in their 3rd homology group that arises from Artin-Verdier duality. This invariant refines the lifting invariant that, in the function field setting, corresponds to stable components of Hurwitz space. One major input into our function field results is an application of our recently developed methods to determine a distribution of groups (or more general algebraic structures) from its moments. We prove non-existence results in the number field case that support our conjectures in the case where our conjectures predict certain kinds of groups occur with probability zero.

AI.tldr: 研究有限群Γ-覆盖的射影线基本群中与q|Γ|互素部分的分布，以及伽罗瓦群在最大非分歧扩张中的分布规律
AI.motivation: 研究Γ-覆盖的基本群分布规律，为伽罗瓦群在最大非分歧扩张中的分布提出新猜想，特别关注基域中单位根对分布的影响
AI.method: 引入Artin-Verdier对偶产生的3阶同调类作为新不变量，应用矩方法确定代数结构的分布，在函数域和数域两种情况下分别研究
AI.result: 证明了函数域中Γ-覆盖基本群分布的渐近结果，提出了数域中伽罗瓦群分布的新猜想，并在数域情况下证明了某些群以概率零出现的非存在性结果
AI.conclusion: 通过函数域与数域的类比，揭示了单位根对伽罗瓦群分布的影响机制，为理解伽罗瓦群在最大非分歧扩张中的分布规律提供了新视角

title: Torsion points on $\rm{GL}_2$-type abelian varieties
comment: 11 pages, comments are welcome! Github repo: https://github.com/NirvanaC93/Torsion-of-GL2-abelian-varieties
summary: It is well known that the rational torsion of an abelian variety defined over a number field injects into the reduction modulo any sufficiently large prime, so the order of the torsion group divides the greatest common divisor of the sizes of points on the reduction at each prime. Drawing inspiration from Katz's Inventiones paper (1981), we investigate the converse to this for abelian varieties of $\rm GL_2$-type and exhibit a conjectural list of possible torsion orders for modular abelian varieties over $\mathbb Q$ of dimension up to $5$.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了GL2型阿贝尔簇的逆问题：从模约化的最大公约数信息推测有理挠子群的可能阶数，并给出了维数≤5的模阿贝尔簇的挠子阶数猜想列表。
AI.motivation: 已知数域上阿贝尔簇的有理挠子群会注入到足够大素数的模约化中，因此挠子群的阶数整除每个素数约化点集大小的最大公约数。本研究受Katz(1981)工作的启发，探讨这个问题的逆命题：对于GL2型阿贝尔簇，能否从模约化的最大公约数信息推测有理挠子群的可能阶数？
AI.method: 研究针对GL2型阿贝尔簇，特别是模阿贝尔簇，通过分析模约化点集大小的最大公约数与有理挠子群阶数之间的关系，系统研究了维数不超过5的模阿贝尔簇的挠子阶数可能性。
AI.result: 研究得出了维数不超过5的模阿贝尔簇的有理挠子群可能阶数的猜想列表，为这类特殊阿贝尔簇的挠子结构提供了系统的分类猜想。
AI.conclusion: 对于GL2型阿贝尔簇，特别是模阿贝尔簇，从模约化的最大公约数信息可以推测有理挠子群的可能阶数，研究给出了维数≤5情况的完整猜想列表，为进一步研究这类阿贝尔簇的算术性质提供了基础。

title: Toward the $p$-adic Hodge parameters in the potentially crystalline representations of $\mathrm{GL}_n$
summary: Let $p$ be a prime number, $n$ an integer $\geq 2$, and $L$ a finite extension of $\mathrm{Q}_p$. Let $ρ_L$ be an $n$-dimensional (non-critical but not necessary generic) potentially crystalline $p$-adic Galois representation of the absolute Galois groups of $L$ of regular Hodge-Tate weights. By generalizing the previous results and strategy for the crystabelline case of Ding and the recent work of Breuil-Ding, we construct an explicit locally analytic representation $π_{1}(ρ_L)$, and describe explicitly the information of Hodge filtration of $ρ_L$ it determines. When $ρ_L$ comes from a patched $p$-adic automorphic representation, we show that $π_{1}(ρ_L)$ is a subrepresentation of the $\mathrm{GL}_n(L)$-representation globally associated to $ρ_L$, under some mild hypothesis.

AI.tldr: 本文推广了Ding和Breuil-Ding的工作，为n维正则Hodge-Tate权重的潜在结晶p-adic Galois表示构造了显式的局部解析表示π₁(ρ_L)，并描述了它确定的Hodge过滤信息。当ρ_L来自修补的p-adic自守表示时，在某些温和假设下，π₁(ρ_L)是全局关联到ρ_L的GL_n(L)-表示的子表示。
AI.motivation: 本文的动机是推广之前关于结晶表示的研究结果。Ding和Breuil-Ding之前研究了结晶表示的情况，本文旨在将他们的方法和结果推广到更一般的潜在结晶p-adic Galois表示，特别是正则Hodge-Tate权重的情况。这有助于更好地理解p-adic Galois表示与局部解析表示之间的对应关系。
AI.method: 作者通过推广Ding和Breuil-Ding之前为结晶情况开发的结果和策略，为n维正则Hodge-Tate权重的潜在结晶p-adic Galois表示构造了一个显式的局部解析表示π₁(ρ_L)。方法包括描述该表示确定的Hodge过滤信息，并研究当ρ_L来自修补的p-adic自守表示时，π₁(ρ_L)与全局关联表示之间的关系。
AI.result: 主要结果包括：1）成功构造了显式的局部解析表示π₁(ρ_L)；2）明确描述了该表示确定的Hodge过滤信息；3）证明了当ρ_L来自修补的p-adic自守表示时，在某些温和假设下，π₁(ρ_L)是全局关联到ρ_L的GL_n(L)-表示的子表示。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功地将Ding和Breuil-Ding关于结晶表示的工作推广到更一般的潜在结晶p-adic Galois表示情况。构造的局部解析表示π₁(ρ_L)不仅提供了Hodge过滤的显式信息，而且在自守表示背景下具有重要的结构性意义，为p-adic Galois表示与局部解析表示之间的对应关系提供了新的理解。

title: Elementary local representation densities at all primes via lifting recursions
comment: 24 pages. Ancillary files include Lean 4 formalization and Python verification scripts
summary: Let $p$ be a prime and let $L$ be a quadratic $\mathbb{Z}_p$-lattice with quadratic form $Q$. For $t\neq 0$ the local representation density $α_p(t;L)$ is the stable normalised growth of the congruence counts of solutions to $Q(v)\equiv t\pmod{p^m}$. We compute these counts and densities explicitly for the hyperbolic plane $H_0$ over $\mathbb{Z}p$, uniformly in $p$, and at $p=2$ for the basic dyadic blocks (rank-$1$ Type I blocks and the even binary planes $2^aH\varepsilon$), together with the anisotropic ternary lattice $L_3=\langle 2\rangle^{\oplus 3}$. At the dyadic prime the usual Jacobian/Hensel lifting mechanism breaks down in the bilinear-lattice convention $Q(v)=\langle v,v\rangle$. The main new input is an explicit half-lift involution for diagonal sums of squares, which yields a stable lifting recursion with factor $2^{d-1}$ under the primitivity hypothesis $4\nmid a$. As applications we obtain closed forms for the three-squares congruence counts (hence $α_2(t;L_3)$) and a prime-uniform formula for the densities of the scaled hyperbolic planes $p^eH_0$ in the standard normalisation $q=\langle\cdot,\cdot\rangle/2$.

AI.tldr: 本文计算了二次Z_p格上局部表示密度的显式公式，特别针对双曲平面和二元格，解决了p=2时雅可比/亨泽尔提升机制失效的问题。
AI.motivation: 在二次Z_p格理论中，局部表示密度α_p(t;L)是研究同余计数的重要工具。然而在p=2时，传统的雅可比/亨泽尔提升机制在双线性格约定Q(v)=⟨v,v⟩下失效，需要新的方法来计算这些密度。
AI.method: 提出了一个显式的半提升对合方法，用于处理平方和对角和。在原始性假设4∤a下，该方法产生了一个稳定的提升递归，因子为2^{d-1}。应用该方法计算了双曲平面H_0和基本二元格（秩1类型I块和偶二元平面2^aHε）以及各向异性三元格L_3=⟨2⟩^{⊕3}的表示密度。
AI.result: 获得了双曲平面H_0在p=2时的同余计数和密度显式公式，以及三个平方同余计数的闭式（从而得到α_2(t;L_3)）。还得到了缩放双曲平面p^eH_0在标准归一化q=⟨·,·⟩/2下的素数一致密度公式。
AI.conclusion: 通过引入显式的半提升对合方法，成功解决了p=2时雅可比/亨泽尔提升机制失效的问题，为二次Z_p格的局部表示密度计算提供了统一的理论框架和显式公式，特别在二元情况下取得了重要进展。

title: Potential Relation Between the Riemann Zeta Function and the Polynomial Function $F$ of the Generalized Erdős--Straus Conjecture, Subject to its Analytic Continuation
summary: In this article, we explore a natural extension of the quadratic parametrization introduced in our previous work. By replacing the integer $n$ by $n^s$ ($ s\in\mathbb{R}, s>1$) and allowing the parameters to be real, we obtain for each $n\ge 1$ a decomposition $\frac{k}{n^s} = \frac{1}{x_s(n)}+\frac{1}{y_s(n)}+\frac{1}{z_s(n)}$ with $x_s(n), y_s(n), z_s(n) \in \mathbb{R}^*+$. Summing this equality over all integers brings forth the Riemann zeta function. Subject to an analytic continuation of the quantities $x_s(n), y_s(n), z_s(n)$ to complex values of $s$, one would obtain a new function \(G_k(s)\) satisfying $G_k(s)=k\,ζ(s)$, thus establishing a deep connection between the structure of the conjecture and the zeros of $ζ$.
